column4: i tried to install Ubuntu 9.1 with an existing Fedora 11, am not quite successful yet.. 9.1 requires ext4 too like fedora or not?
Ubuntu 9.10 defaults to ext4, but it will run on just about anything.
I wouldn't advise sharing /home between different distros, but it should probablymostly work.
i tried the install with sharing /home, and yep it messed up the existing fedora, somehow i ended up with that deleted ICEauthority file,
